description: white plate with slightly squared-off shape; top surface decorated with incised and low-relief design of black silhouettes of matador on horseback at left spearing a bull at right in the head; black silhouettes of spectators at top; yellow, green and blue touches

markings: on bottom, in black: 128/200 | on bottom, stamped: EMPRENTE / ORIGINALE DE / PICASSO | MADOURA / [flames] / PLEIN FEU
title: Plate
